column2: This child resembles its family - but the subtle differences will determine how others respond to [Root.GetHerHis] appearance.
One can only hope for the best.
As this child begins to feed and grow, you begin to see indications of [Root.GetHerHis] future physical strength and stamina.
May [Root.GetSheHe] become as fit and vigorous as the heroes of old!
As this child interacts with the world, you learn whether or not [Root.GetSheHe] takes after [Root.GetHerHis] parents in mental ability.
Pray [Root.GetSheHe] has learned from [Root.GetHerHis] family even while in the womb

This youth has spent years learning about matters of war and feats of valor! [Root.GetHerHis] highly active lifestyle has led [Root.GetHerHim] to become stronger.
That's wonderful!
This youngster has never been one to spend much time playing or working outdoors, or training for a career in the army. As a result, [Root.GetHerHis] childhood's vigor has atrophied in adolescence.
That's terrible!
This youth has demonstrated an exceptional gift for intellectual achievement. Perhaps [Root.GetSheHe]'s smarter than you thought!
That's wonderful!
This youngster has always shied away from book learning, and never applied [Root.GetHerHim]self to the world of thought. [Root.GetHerHis] natural promise has dulled as an adolescent.
That's terrible!
This youth has gone through [Root.GetHerHis] awkward phase, and matured into a person much easier on the eyes.
That's wonderful!
This youngster isn't quite as cute as [Root.GetSheHe] was as a child, anymore, and it shows.
That's terrible!
This youth has grown into a much more coordinated adolescent - well, at least compared to some others.
That's wonderful!
This youngster seems even more awkward than most people [Root.GetHerHis] age. You're not sure if [Root.GetSheHe]'ll ever totally grow out of it.
That's terrible!
This youth has had a growth spurt! [Root.GetSheHe] has shot up to heights you certainly didn't see coming!
That's wonderful!
This youngster hasn't grown as much as you've expected, during adolesence. Perhaps [Root.GetSheHe] won't get as tall as you thought, as an adult.
That's terrible!

This young adult has dedicated even more time to swordplay since [Root.GetHerHis] teenage years. [Root.GetHerHisCap] interest and persistence has paid off, and [Root.GetSheHe] now demonstrates much more skill with a blade.
That's great!
